001package com.telos.loops.error;
002
003/**
004 * Thrown when client-side validation fails before making an API request.
005 *
006 * <p>This exception is raised when request parameters fail validation checks performed by the SDK
007 * before sending the request to the Loops API. This helps catch common errors early and avoid
008 * unnecessary API calls.
009 *
010 * <h2>Common Scenarios</h2>
011 *
012 * <ul>
013 *   <li><b>Missing required fields:</b> Email or userId not provided when required
014 *   <li><b>Invalid formats:</b> Malformed email addresses or invalid data types
015 *   <li><b>Constraint violations:</b> Values outside acceptable ranges or patterns
016 *   <li><b>Mutually exclusive fields:</b> Both email and userId provided when only one is allowed
017 * </ul>
018 *
019 * <h2>Example Usage</h2>
020 *
021 * <pre>{@code
022 * LoopsClient client = LoopsClient.builder()
023 *         .apiKey("your-api-key")
024 *         .build();
025 *
026 * try {
027 *     // This will throw LoopsValidationException if request validation fails
028 *     ContactCreateRequest request = new ContactCreateRequest(
029 *         null,  // Missing email - validation error!
030 *         null,
031 *         "John",
032 *         "Doe",
033 *         null,
034 *         true,
035 *         null
036 *     );
037 *     client.contacts().create(request);
038 * } catch (LoopsValidationException e) {
039 *     System.err.println("Validation failed: " + e.getMessage());
040 *     // Fix the request and retry
041 * } catch (LoopsApiException e) {
042 *     System.err.println("API error: " + e.getMessage());
043 * }
044 * }</pre>
045 *
046 * <h2>Retry Behavior</h2>
047 *
048 * <p>Validation exceptions should not be retried without fixing the request parameters. These
049 * errors indicate a problem with the request itself, not a transient server issue.
050 *
051 * @see LoopsApiException
052 * @see RateLimitExceededException
053 */
054public class LoopsValidationException extends RuntimeException {
055  /**
056   * Constructs a new LoopsValidationException with the specified error message.
057   *
058   * @param message a description of the validation failure
059   */
060  public LoopsValidationException(String message) {
061    super(message);
062  }
063}
